# tf.keras.backend.get_value


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r2.0/tensorflow/python/keras/backend.py#L3254-L3279">

  </a>
</td></table>



Returns the value of a variable.

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.get_value`
* `tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.get_value`


``` python
tf.keras.backend.get_value(x)
```



### Used in the guide:

* [Keras custom callbacks](https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/keras/custom_callback)




#### Arguments:


* <b>`x`</b>: input variable.


#### Returns:

A Numpy array.
